channel.title: Getting-starteds on Martian
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on Martian

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installing Martian Official binary distributions of the Martian toolchain are available for Linux, macOS and Windows: Download OS Arch SHA256 martian-2.3.0-rc0.1-linux-amd64.tar.gz Linux x86-64 martian-2.3.0-rc0.1-darwin-amd64.tar.gz macOS x86-64 Coming soon Windows x86-64 Building from Source Prerequisites Go 1.8 or higher is required to build Martian. The Python adapter for wrapping stage code requires Python 2.
